subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-east-1)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-east-1)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The admin-dashboard service in the us-east-1 region is experiencing critical performance issues, with a high load time of 6688.4ms. This indicates potential inefficiencies in resource loading or delays in backend services. Users are facing slow loading times and intermittent failures, which can lead to frustration and decreased productivity. The issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: admin-dashboard
Region: us-east-1
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 6688.4,
  "bundle_size_kb": 475.38,
  "resources_loaded": 42
}

Workaround: Currently, there are no effective workarounds. It is recommended to investigate the performance bottlenecks in the frontend code and backend services, optimize resource loading, and review network configurations.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

extracted_fields.impact: Users are facing slow loading times and intermittent failures, leading to frustration and decreased productivity.

pending_fields: any recent changes made to the system

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical performance issue in the admin-dashboard that is impacting users significantly and requires immediate attention.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
